name: Little Strategy
description:
Play as Lady Will, a young lady of a trouble country.

The gameplay is really simple, the 3 main elements are :
- Towers : they generate soldiers
- Soldier : they explore and conquer resource. They cost gold to be build and also when out of the towers.
- Gold : gain from towers/tree/stone/iron that you control

The main twist are :
- Recruited troops cost gold to maintain, it seem nothing, but you can't keep all your troop out all the time. You're forced to explore with small troops, and choose the right timing to attack.
- You must equilibrate gold and troop income to be efficient (you can have too many money and no troop, or lot's of troop you can't recruit).

Features:
- Single player story
- 4 player multiplayer on a single screen (1 Mouse + 1 keyboard + 2 gamepads)
- Random map Generator
- up to 27 players (with team setting)
- up to 99*99 map size

Check the DEMO!
